snippet.title: Moonglow Bay - Official Gameplay Trailer | Day of the Devs 2021
snippet.description:
Journey to the Eastern Canadian coastline during the 1980s, where you play as a rookie angler struggling to fulfill your partner's final wish by keeping a business afloat in the face of impending bankruptcy. Get another look at the game, as revealed during Day of the Devs 2021. Moonglow Bay, featuring an emotionally charged story complemented by a slice-of-life fishing RPG, is headed to Xbox Series X, Xbox One, Xbox Game Pass, and PC.

#GameTrailers #Gaming #SummerOfGaming
